We should sync access to fLastStackFrame - it can be nulled out when a lanuch 
terminates at the same time we are processing events for that frame.

Fixed in LaunchViewEventHandler.

Rather than adding synchronization, the fix is to simply pass the local 
variable (arg) to the autoexpand method, rather that the instance variable 
copy of the local which can be subsquently nulled out.
